Hello community!
If the app doesn't start properly, uninstall it, then install it with:

sudo snap install caprine --devmode

Note that --devmode is the key here, so make sure you don't forget that part.
Please repair the error.

Version: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (Bionic Beaver)

I like what the goal of the app is: to create and maintain a privacy-focused Messenger client for Linux. I like how it generally functions like the Messenger mobile app.

Caprine does have the issue, however, of being choppy when scrolling through conversations, and I've had issues with logging in on-and-off, including one time today where it took me to a Facebook Web page that said there was an issue and to try again later (or something to that effect). As I said, the idea is great, but the execution could be better. Thus, I'll probably stick with using Facebook Messenger on my Web browser for a time unless I decide to re-download and give it another go.
summary: Works okay, but is choppy and buggy

une application géniale sauf que depuis quelques jours, elle ne fonctionne plus, je ne sait pas si c'est du à une mise a jour de Ubuntu ou quoi exactement, sauf que j'ai constaté que je ne suis pas le seul chez qui elle ne fonctionne plus.
Je ne comprends pas pourquoi cette application ne s'ouvre plus. Apparemment cela ne vient pas de mon ordi. Dommage pour cette application qui était vraiment top...

....et puis plus moyen de l'ouvrir. Et ce même après désinstallation/réinstallation.

Donc bien...mais quand ça marche!
